price: So the magicians fell down in prostration[17], saying, “We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses.”
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
footnotes: [17] They realized that the miracles of Moses were not impressions of magic, but absolute realities.
